TextView.android:text: In today‟s world if someone wants to book a Doctor‟s Appointment we need to call in clinic or personally go to that place and book the appointment.\n This consumes precious time of the patient. Also if the doctor cancels his/her schedule, the patient does not come to know about it unless he/she goes to the clinic. The objective of this project is to build a system that will ease the process of booking appointment of the doctor. The patient will book the appointment through his/her mobile phone. It will save the clerk's paper work. The system will prove to be useful for Clerk as he can check his appointments whenever and from wherever he wants from his mobile phone.
